====================== 
Features: 
======================

-Fully Updated and Updatable
-Fully Genuine  and passes all WGA checks
-No CD key Needed
-Added Service Pack 3 RTM build 5512
-Added Internet Explorer 7
-Added Windows Media Player 11
-Fully automatic Installation
-ssWPI 6 by Ron integrated
-Silent apps Installations
-Only needs 100MB of ram on fresh install
-Over a 100 Tweaks to make it stable reliable and fast.
-The full glass Vista theme and look.
-VMware Tools automatically installed if you install in Vmware
-Added Flash For Internet Explorer
-Added DirectX Redistributable 9.0c March 2008
-All software included is the latest edition as of April 24th 2008
-Only the Asian Langueges are removed the restis kept
-This release is kept to a CD sized ISO so anyone can use it
